about_the_game:
Ant In Training is a top down 2d indie puzzle game. Experience life as a novice ant. Find your way through puzzles and unlock new powers along the way. Can you rescue all the cats and unlock the secret shrine?

The game features six levels. In each level you will gain a new ability, which is required to reach the primary exit. Each level has also a hidden collectable (a cat). Find all the collectables to unlock the final exit and win the game! Some levels will need to be revisited after gaining abilities in order to reach the cat.
detailed_description:
Upcoming updates

Hello everyone, After hearing some feedback from players, I am going to release an update shortly that fixes some headaches: - escape will no longer quit the game. Given escape is also used to dismiss a chat dialog, this would sometimes lead to accidentally quitting. - Fix up some unclear dialogs from the elder ants.
